sn35.8:0.3: The Interior as Suffering in the Three Times
sn35.8:1.1: “Mendicants, the eye of the past and future is suffering,
sn35.8:1.3: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple is not concerned with the eye of the past,
sn35.8:1.4: they don’t look forward to enjoying the eye in the future,
sn35.8:1.5: and they practice for disillusionment, dispassion, and cessation regarding the eye in the present. …”
